mean_en: someone who plays a musical instrument while another person is singing or playing the main part :someone who plays an accompaniment
sentence: She sang while her accompanists played the piano and double bass.
sentence_trans: 她唱歌，她的伴奏者弹钢琴和低音提琴。
word_etyma: ac一再 ＋ compan陪伴 ＋ ist与某事物有关的人 → accompanist伴奏者；伴随者
